import { createSignal, For } from "solid-js" import { IconCheck, IconFile, IconSelector } from "@/components/icons" import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuTrigger } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu" import { SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuButton, SidebarMenuItem } from "@/components/ui/sidebar" export function VersionSwitcher(props: { versions: string[]; defaultVersion: string }) { const [selectedVersion, setSelectedVersion] = createSignal(props.defaultVersion) return (
Documentation v{selectedVersion()}
{(version) => ( setSelectedVersion(version)}> v{version} {version === selectedVersion() && } )} ) }
